#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;

ll MOD = 1000000007;

ll raise(ll b, ll exp)
{
    ll r=1;
    while(exp)
    {
        if(exp&1)r=(r*b)%MOD;
        b=(b*b)%MOD;
        exp>>=1;
    }
    return r;
}

vector<int> a;
vector<int>::iterator p,q;
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
    int t,n,i,x;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        a.clear();
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>x;
            a.pb(x);
        }
        sort(a.begin(),a.end());
        p=a.begin();
        q=a.end()-1;
        while(p<q)
        {
            cout<<*q<<" "<<*p<<" ";
            q--;
            p++;
        }
        if(p==q)cout<<*q<<endl;
        else cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}


// ^_^ \\
